thread.title: Jose Mourinho outlines Manchester United's summer transfer plans after quiet January window
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho outlines Manchester United's summer transfer plans after quiet January window

author: Jacob Murtagh
title: Jose Mourinho outlines Manchester United's summer transfer plans after quiet January window
text:
Sport Jose Mourinho outlines Manchester United's summer transfer plans after quiet January window The Red Devils has resisted the temptation to splash the cash in the winter window and has turned his attention to the summer instead Share Manchester manager Jose Mourinho has opened up about his plans (Photo: John Peters) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jose Mourinho insists he has already outlined his plans for the next transfer window. 
The Manchester United manager has resisted the temptation to splash the cash in January after seeing his side's fortunes improve after a disastrous start. 
“I don't know what to say. I cannot speak for the other teams, their decisions, what they think," he said. 
"In our case, we are more focused on the summer period. I like my players, so nothing for me. 
“I know what I want I always think every week the more I know my players, the more I know my team, the more I know the competition, because it's a competition I know really well, but it's a competition in permanent evolution. Read More Jose Mourinho declares Wayne Rooney to STAY at Manchester United Wayne Rooney looks set to stay at Old Trafford (Photo: Getty) 
"I know what I want, the market closes today, so there is no point in me speaking about the next transfer window when we have so many matches to play, so much to fight for, so many good players to work with. 
"If you ask me 'do I know what I want for the next transfer window?' yes I know. Is it possible to get? I'll try, always, to be realistic." Read More
